place_description: Cafe featuring coffee, food and pastries made fresh daily.

reviews_data.review_text: A delightful establishment renowned for its exceptional coffee, crafted with homemade syrups, complemented by a delectable culinary experience and impeccable service.
The atmosphere is really good, so quiet and the staff is very helpful. I ordered a Cappuccino so good
Good coffee

Woke up this morning in need of a nice coffee and light breakfast to start my day. I googled coffee shops near me and was instantly attracted to the name "Verb Coffee" as my plan was a little caffeine and sustenance to get my body activated for the long day ahead. When you follow the gps to this location drive slow and careful as one wrong turn may set your arrival time back a few minutes and can lead to frustration. Anyway the parking lot has plenty of space. The atmosphere is very open, light, and calming. I came on a Friday afternoon and met Cameron. He was very welcoming and knowledgeable and just overall very nice and inviting person. I told him what my mood was  and he made his suggestions. I ended up drinking their cold brew and having a light avocado toast. Cameron explained most their products they use other local businesses to supply and I absolutely loved that. There is WiFi and plenty of space for students to hang out and get some work done. The pictures speak  for themselves.
-Lydia Hamilton 11/9/2024 1:32pm
Instagram: @shotsoflydi
Beautiful coffee shop with delicious coffee and matcha! 10/10 recommend!

This was our first visit. We just got a regular coffee and pastry. The coffee was very good. The pastries were fresh and flavorful. Service was friendly. The place us simple but comfortable. We plan to try other menu items.
Quality espresso and best Cortado in the county!
First time & everything was great !!!

Absolutely love this place, if you love coffee, their coffee just has this real smooth, not real sweet taste, it's great. The food OMG!!! from the waffles, to the Eggs and Hash, all the pastries especially the Banana Chocolate Chip bread, it's amazing. That's just about the coffee and food, the atmosphere is very laidback always a friendly, smiling face there to greet you.
Tasty tea cake and really good cortado, but unfortunately the kitchen was closed at 3PM

Coffee has always been excellent.
The breakfast burrito was good.
Love the egg and hash.

The last four visits have taken forever. Very understaffed.
A hidden gem along the busiest thoroughfare connecting Concord to Kannapolis, a lovely local coffee shop to grab a drink and work quietly amongst the locals.
Delicious coffee and great customer service. Skip the line at other big name coffee places and try this spot!
What a great Independant coffee shop. Very high quality selections and great friendly service.

I LOVE THIS COFFEE SHOP. Best experience by far at a coffee shop. I don't come to this area often, but when I do I make a point to stop by Verb. The manager, Jake is especially friendly, and you can tell that he has a genuine heart for good coffee in the area. Each drink is so exquisitely crafted, with a great coffee flavor. If I could give 10 stars I would. Make sure to stop by Verb on your next trip to the kannapolis area!
First of all, this is a really cute place to do homework and just vibe! Second, their coffee is amazing! Third, the staff is so friendly especially Jake Horton!!!
Some of the best coffee, hands down, that I've had since living in Concord (and honestly CLT too) & their breakfast is AWESOME too!
Delicious!
Cute little place with a good vibe
Great atmosphere, friendly, the best coffee in Concord.

Looked like a chill place to sit in with friends. I got my drink and food to go. I had iced matcha latte and avocado waffel with feta cheese. Both were great tasting and made elegantly. I enjoyed the matcha more.

Great customer service, barista was so nice & helpful. Tried the medley iced latte and maple butter iced latte, both were delicious with balanced flavors and came in cute glassware. :) Atmosphere was aesthetic and peaceful 10/10.
Hands down, the best coffee and tea in Concord!
I love this place! Best coffee around, baristas are always kind, quality coffee and food.
Love this coffee so much .. got to go everyday
Best people in the world. Love the vibes and the
Love this place, so cute!! Great coffee!
No one would take my order it was the craziest thing. just stood there. Probably because I'm just a dirty blue cooler worker
Great coffee and the Peach cake was delicious.
We love verb.  It's an ideal spot for meetings with friends and great coffee.  Highly recommend for anyone in the area to stop by!

Verb Coffee is unmatched. From the curb appeal, first impressions, the ambience and atmosphere, to the always friendly staff, great service and even better quality of coffee. My wife and I live out of state and we come to Concord often to visit family - every time we are in town we make it a priority to visit verb at least two or three times. We never leave dissatisfied. If I lived here, Verb would be my daily coffee stop. We love everything here.
Actually the best  genuine tasting coffee/ beans  you'll find in the Charlotte area . Amazing high quality service and food ! Friendly staff and atmosphere :)) .
Ordered a maple butter latte with oatmilk and a plain waffle. It was amazing and the service and atmosphere were wonderful.

We love everything about Verb. The baristas instantly became friends to us and engage with us every time we come in. We get their refill coffee beans every month and are never disappointed. The food is sublime. They go above and beyond with making their drinks and food the best quality they can. I know I'll always have a good experience when I go to Verb!

Found them during the pandemic when they were Groundwork Common. High quality in house roasted coffee and in house made syrups. Very consistent as things are weighed. Not only is it better than anything nearby, but also get to support a local business.
Really nice spot, coffee was exceptional!
Great iced decaf caramel latte! Excellent service!
The people here are lovely! The best cup of Chai I've ever had!
Verb is amazing, kind, and quality. Love having a local coffee shop that serves light roast coffee plus their breakfast burrito is amazing! You have to get it.
Spent the entire morning here working remotely. Great place! I will be making this a regular thing!!!
Small coffee shops are big on quality and kindness! Simple breakfast bowl and chai were perfect!

Very cute coffee shop that used to be a dinner but a great and simplistic vibe with quality products. We did have to wait a little longer than expected for our coffee order but the staff was very friendly and accommodating.

Wow one of the best coffees I've had in Charlotte metro. Tried seasonal coffee with orange, lavender and rosemary. It's was super delicious! Not too sweet  and not overpowering flavors. The coffee was really smooth. Bough the beans as well. And the best part they open Monday - Saturday till 9pm.
Always top notch.
Excellent, friendly, warm and knowledgeable baristas + kitchen staff! Recommendations were detailed and accurate. Shop is beautiful and simple with great vibes. Great parking too!
Coffee was delicious and service was even better! The baristas were excellent. Would recommend to anyone!
I drink coffee black and think Starbucks is pretty mediocre. This is top 3 Best black coffees within a 100 mile radius.

Great coffee.
FYI, the Avocado toast doesn't contain eggs and tastes amazing.

Great alternative to Starbucks and Dunkin.  Nice little coffee shop.  Nice and roomy. It had mostly coffee and very few pastry choices, but we visited after 7pm so they may have just had low inventory after a busy day.    The server was very sweet and we drank out of Real cups (not paper).  Perfect to meet friends/family and have desserts.  (Would hope they would stock some more sweets to choose from).
An easy spot to get a great tasting cup before hitting the highway.

Coffee is vibrant, delicious and not acidic what so ever. Pastries are not heavy at all, not overly sweet, and complement your drink fantastically. (The Earl Grey muffin and almond apple crumble are both amazing!)

Definitely recommend the AEC sandwich if you like avocado and a touch of spice.

All in all, a very welcoming and open minded place to grab a warm cup and a quick bite!
great coffee and food.

Wonderful craft coffee establishment! Easy access off of the interstate if you're passing through. Great vibe & friendly baristas who know how to prepare a proper espresso. Can't recommend this place enough. I always go for a latte as a quality test of a shop, and the latte here blew my wife & I away.
Excellent coffee place. The barista was fantastic.
Superb matcha latte made with unsweetened almond milk and divine green tea.
Verb was so kind as to donate some coffee to teachers for an appreciation day! I have since visited them several times for their coffee

Very good plain Latte. Kinda hard to get to the store but with persistence it'll get easier.
Wish the coffee came in larger sizes and wish their menu wasn't so sparse.
Service was very good too. Girl handling the shop by herself on New Year's Day did a fine job.
I'd come back for another Latte.

An update. Their banana bread with chocolate chips in it is to die for. The best I've had in the Carolinas so far.
Winter mocha is a 10/10 ! The customer service is amazing!
Great coffee and excellent customer service!
Nice little Cafe, staff are always friendly  definitely recommend stopping by.

Service was excellent.

Staff were very friendly and helpful.

They had a nice selection of made to order food and pasties.

They have a seasonal menu which is always fun to be able to experiment

Iced espresso was really good.

Food can be taken to go.
The Chai lattes are very good. The staff are friendly. And it has a cool minimalist atmosphere. I highly recommend going to verb coffee.

Thoroughly enjoyed our first trip to Verb. The staff was super friendly and helpful. The drinks came out at a nice pace. The food had really nice unique flavors. The interior and decor was laid back and relaxing. A good spot to hang out for an hour or so. I would recommend going out of your way to give them a try.

My wife loves coffee and trying new coffee shops. So we checked out this place as she normally passes it on her way to work.

While you can easily see it from the road, it does take a few turns through a little neighborhood to reach it. Yet, there is plenty of parking once ypu get there.

The actually shop is not big as you have about six little seating areas including two couches. They do offer three more seating areas outside.

While I'm not a big coffee person, I do love apple cider and they had an apple cider Chai on the menu. It was very good. I also order the eggs and hash. It was a bit on the small size yet good. Make sure to tell them how you want your eggs as they come over easy. It's a good local shop if you are in the area.
I got the cold brew; fresh, crisp, and refreshing. Very cool atmosphere that's "off the beaten path", quiet, and clean.

Cozy Charm and Coffee Delights at Verb Coffee

This morning, I stumbled upon a hidden gem nestled in the heart of Concord - Verb Coffee. Drawn in by the inviting aroma of freshly roasted beans, I stepped inside and was immediately charmed by the warm, intimate atmosphere.

The space is small, but it exudes a welcoming vibe with soft lighting, exposed brick walls adorned with local art, and comfy seating that begs for lingered conversation. The barista greeted me with a genuine smile and a contagious enthusiasm for coffee.

Unsure of their winter selection, I eagerly took their recommendation for a seasonal latte. Creamy, rich, and infused with warm spices, it was pure winter magic in a cup. My companion opted for a classic latte, equally delightful with its perfectly balanced espresso and steamed milk. Each sip was a testament to the quality of their beans and skilled brewing.

Beyond the exceptional beverages, Verb Coffee shines with its focus on community. Local artwork graces the walls, and the barista took the time to chat with every customer who walked in, creating a friendly and genuine atmosphere. I left feeling not just caffeinated, but also connected to the warmth and energy of the space.

Whether you're a coffee connoisseur or a casual latte sipper, Verb Coffee is a must-visit. It's a place where time slows down, conversation flows, and every cup is a celebration of quality and community.

Highlights:

* Delicious coffee with seasonal specials and classic favorites
* Warm and inviting atmosphere with a strong community focus
* Friendly and knowledgeable staff
* Perfect for a quiet morning retreat or a catch-up with friends

Verdict: If you're looking for a cozy coffee haven with expertly crafted beverages and a genuine community spirit, head to Verb Coffee - you won't be disappointed!

Rating: 5 out of 5 stars

Final tip: Don't forget to browse their selection of locally roasted beans to take a piece of Verb Coffee magic home with you!
Amazing coffee! We drive from Charlotte, that's how good it is! The Team makes it even better! It's also such a vibe
They have lavender syrup!!!

My boyfriend and I decided to stop in today for the first time. We were immediately welcomed into the cafe with a smile and a friendly "Hello!". The food was AMAZING and our Chai lattes were fragrant and delicious. We totally recommend to anyone who's interested and we will definitely be going back!
The best coffee in NC
I passionate felt weirdly judged
The vibes are immaculate. The drinks are delicious. I love this little place and hope it stays forever!

Nice people and good coffee, but yall must improve the wait times. Today we waited nearly 15 mins for 1 latte and an iced coffee. Having been here 4 times, all of the visits are have been that long. Also, iced coffee are 5 bucks, are in a 12 oz cup, and are 80% ice. Ice coffees need to go in larger cups for that reason
Verb Coffee is now my favorite coffee shop in Concord. The service, taste and vibe is unmatched. I highly recommend the iced matcha latte.
Verb is a VIBE! Good having another specialty roaster local to the area!

Verb Coffee is a low-key place to hang out and drink great coffee. This is a fairly new establishment with a hidden entrance. The atmosphere is amazing and stress-free. This is quickly becoming one of my favorite places to go.

IMPORTANT: they can not be accessed from Rt29 directly.
Turn right on the street just BEFORE you get to Verb.
It was the best Latte I've had in weeks. The decor is clearly in process but fun. A very down to earth but professional staff was icing on the cake. And It is a pleasure to support a local company.
O wow best coffee I've had in USA
Great coffee and great breakfast!!
Amazing coffee and the staff is awesome
A bit basic on the food/pastry selection but coffee was good. Tucked away but fairly close to hospital if you just need a break from the hospital.
Best coffee in Concord. Love the atmosphere and community you've created
Awesome
Good coffee close to where I was when I looked at maps. Young folks inside were nice and personable. They had pastries... but coffee is good food!

Order:
- Lavender Chai w/ Cinnamon
- Caramel Latte
- Lavender Iced Latte w/ Oat Milk

Cameron - he likes kittens and is hospitable.
Great place, the muffins are amazing
Very limited menu, very bland shop, and kinda difficult to get to.  Not the worse coffee, not the best either.  I think if they grow their menu then I am sure things will change for the better.
Yummy coffee!
Nice place that makes the syrups in house! Good coffee very nice people but the inside is minimalist and not my taste...but still comfortable and will likely be back many times!

Like their sister location, Groundwork Common, this place never disappoints. The coffee is always great, as well as the service. They normally have baked goods, also. Only negative is the location not having a direct entrance off of highway 29 - it can be a bit difficult to figure out how to get there your first time.
The best coffee in Concord, without question. Wonderful people and lovely space.
My husband and I came here and I definitely recommend it! Great welcoming atmosphere family friendly! Super tasty treats and drinks! We will be back!
Delicious coffee! Fantastic service!
The staff there is amazing.   Truly good. Kind people.  Great quality coffee.  The banana bread was extremely moist and flavorful.  Great place.
Love this coffee shop and the people who work there. Best coffee shop in the Charlotte area honestly.
Danielle has done an excellent job creating a community in Concord. Thank you.
Fantastic coffee shop! Great for studying or just relaxing! Bailey was really helpful!
Stopped here on the way from the airport, going  back home to Raleigh. Delicious coffees, awesome baked goods, kind & attentive service! Must stop.
OMG this place is so cute. Great coffee and kinda gives that "on the road pitstop" vibe. Would definitely be back when I'm in the area
I went here to do a conference call. I ordered a matcha latte and a pastry. Both were good. Service was great.
Incredible!!! Hit up Verb instead of Starbucks, you won't regret it!
Wonderful staff! Best baked goods ever!
The best cup of coffee!! Definitely recommend you support this locally owned small business

This place is so cute! We pass by it all the time and decided to finally stop in. Cameron was a great barista and offered many helpful suggestions. I got the chocolate banana bread and it was probably one of the best I've ever had. I would recommend dropping in to grab a latte and pastry and help support the new business!

We. Love. Verb!!! A wonderfully curated coffee shop with quaint seating for meet-ups or working on your computer. They have food options and amazing coffee drinks. PLUS, for the caffeine-free friends, Verb offers cold-pressed juice, sparkling water and kombucha!! A great local place yo hang and enjoy our quaint little town of Concord!
I love this place! I wish I lived closer because I would be at Verb Coffee everyday! Everything is just outstanding. Delicious coffee and scrumptious pastries.

Cameron and Danielle were the best hosts. We happened upon the location after a doctor's visit. The ambience is great for getting comfortable with a good book. The coffee is great (be sure to try the Sassy Almond!) and the conversations feel like home. We'll definitely be back on a weekly basis. Thanks!!
They're masters of their craft and they deliver it with a friendly and caring spirit.
Love the coffee and the staff!  Pastries are divine...
Great location with very friendly staff and home away from home vibe. Only complaint is the lack of sugar free options.
Awesome new coffee shop in the area.  Check it out.

Verb Coffee is such an amazing place to work and patronize! I cherish the memories of the past and the ones to come in this fresh location! Thank you Verb coffee team for making a difference by giving this community a home, here in Concord NC.

There are very few coffee places that I can honestly say are superb. This one is one of them. The taste is so smooth, there's no need to add any sugar to mask the taste. I am so happy we found this place!
Beautiful space, friendly staff, and amazing coffee! So excited to have another great shop from the Verb team!

Verb is seriously the best around! This location has a great atmosphere! Just like at Groundwork Common, the specialty drinks are great, but I've never had better black drip from another coffee shop. I highly recommend trying Verb.

A haiku about my experience:

Coffee is a Verb,
Taste, experience, delight
The best coffee 'round.

Absolutely love not only the lattes, but also the matcha and non-caffeinated drinks (like Here Comes Sun - a cascara lemonade)! The pastries are so delicious and they have gluten free options as well! It's a great place to meet a friend or work out of the house. And it's right off the highway so it's super convenient!!!
This place is incredible! Love the vibes, love the coffee... such an awesome spot to be. I love the unique house syrups... gotta try them all!

This new space for Verb Coffee is incredible! They have put such a unique & fresh twist on their already amazing aesthetic in this shop! It's clean, open and spacious, while equally feeling so warm & cozy. Couldn't be happier for this special team of people & all the hard work they've put in to making this so intentional for the people in this community to have yet another place of theirs to feel so welcomed and loved.

Verb coffee is one of the best coffee shops in the Charlotte metro area. Location is right off the interstate which makes it really convenient. They have house made syrups. May I suggest the, sappy almond. Just the right amount of sweetness. Can't wait to visit again.
You won't find better coffee or better people in the area than Verb. It's also a really convenient stop off of I85. My barista Jacob was very knowledgeable and handsome!

Verb coffee is amazing! Homemade syrups,  roast their own beans, amazing and kind baristas, and such a clean and modern atmosphere. We also hear that fun food items will be available soon. We cannot wait to go back! Thank you for bringing craft coffee and food onto our side of greater Charlotte!
Great people, great food, great coffee!!
Long time fan of Groundwork/Verb! Best coffee, tea, and entrees in Cabarrus County!
Can't say enough great things about Verb and the people running it! Just have to experience for yourself.
